structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Refunding assessment bonds with revenue bonds.
law.text: If any district has previously issued bonds secured entirely or partially by the right to levy an assessment as provided by KRS 74.130 to 74.230, both inclusive, and such bonds are redeemed prior to maturity, bonds to refund same may be issued secured solely by the revenue of said system in the manner provided in KRS 74.370.
